thread.title: The Most Controversial Comments That Landed the Duggars in Hot Water
thread.title_full: The Most Controversial Comments That Landed the Duggars in Hot Water

title: The Most Controversial Comments That Landed the Duggars in Hot Water
text:
The Most Controversial Comments That Landed the Duggars in Hot Water Tanvier Peart Share 
duggarfam/Instagram The Duggar family have been known to speak their minds and not shy away from cameras -- so it shouldn't be much of a shock when they give comments based on their convictions, or opinions for that matter. 
Here's a look at some at some of the most controversial comments members of the Duggar family have made to date. Some will make you roll your eyes, and others could leave you in disbelief.
